entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Mount Forest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:18 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 3:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Temperature: -7.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -10.1°C
Wind: WSW 18 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Flurries or snow squalls early in the morning. Blowing snow early in the morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
